PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-07982024-06-21ESDC
ActCanada Student Financial Assistance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Student Financial Assistance Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE REGULATIONS in order to (1) extend temporary increases to available grants and loans for the 2024-2025 academic year; and (2) eliminate the requirement for first-time federal financial assistance applicants aged 22 or older to pass a credit screening.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0146 Publication Date: 2024-07-03
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE REGULATIONS in order to (1) extend temporary increases to available grants and loans for the 2024-2025 academic year; and (2) eliminate the requirement for first-time federal financial assistance applicants aged 22 or older to pass a credit screening.
